name: Snek (mylu)
description:
Controls: Player 1 - WASDQE

                      Player 2 - IJKLUO

                      Player 3 - Home, End, Del, PgDn, Ins, PgUp

                      Player 4 - Num 845679

Snake. But with three dimensions.

Bring a friend, or three, to make EVERYTHING hectic, even keyboard handling!

Feedback/Bugs/Comments: http://bit.ly/x9form
